destination.title: Destination
destination.intro: Discover the breathtaking nature, culture, and history in our tourist destinations. From green hills to stunning beaches, Purworejo Regency offers a variety of unforgettable tourist experiences. Find your favorite type of tourism and make your journey in Purworejo Regency a memorable adventure.

accomodation.title: Accommodation
accomodation.intro: Enjoy a unique and comfortable stay with the various accommodations we offer. From traditional inns to modern resorts, every accommodation in Purworejo Regency has its own charm and comfort. Find the ideal place to stay to make your holiday in Purworejo unforgettable.

culinary.title: Culinary
culinary.intro: Discover a variety of local culinary delights at the culinary tourist destinations in Purworejo Regency. From traditional foods to modern cuisines, enjoy an unforgettable culinary experience that will pamper your taste buds. Explore the diversity of tastes and aromas offered by the tourist destinations in Purworejo Regency, and find the culinary pleasure that suits your preferences.

article.title: Article
article.intro: Welcome to our article list page! Here you can find various interesting articles that discuss various relevant and informative topics about tourism in Purworejo Regency. From tips and tricks, guides, to the latest news, we strive to present useful and inspiring content for you. Explore our article list and find the tourism information in Purworejo Regency you need!

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.intro: Here, you can update your profile information to ensure that your account is up-to-date and meets your needs. Please update the information below according to your preferences.
editProfile.usernameLabelBot: Username is used to distinguish you from other users and will be displayed on every page
editProfile.emailLabelBot: Email is used for login. Please save it to avoid forgetting

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.oldLabelBot: Enter your previous password that you want to change from your account
changePassword.newLabelBot: Enter the new password for your account

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.deactiveLabel: Temporarily or permanently deactivate your account if you want to take a break from our platform
accountSettings.deleteLabel: Deleting your account allows you to permanently remove your account from our platform

deactiveModal.title: Are you sure?
deactiveModal.warningMessage: Read the information below to avoid any worst-case scenario!
deactiveModal.contentText: Deactivating your account will stop your access to our features and remove your personal information from public view. You can reactivate your account anytime by logging back into our platform.
deactiveModal.buttonText: I am sure to deactivate my account

deleteModal.title: Are you sure?
deleteModal.warningMessage: Read the information below to avoid any worst-case scenario!
deleteModal.contentText: Deleting your account will remove all data and information associated with your account. Make sure to carefully consider this decision before proceeding.
deleteModal.buttonText: I am sure to delete my account
